Description: Responsible for creating the technical structure of websites. Making sure web pages are easily accessed and navigated by end users.
Responsible for creating software programs that allow users to perform various tasks over a variety of different devices(pc and/or mobile phones).
Responsible for developing and maintaining data resources that are used to store and retrieve critical information.
Responsible for assessing computer systems and recommending changes to harware and software for maximum computer efficiency.
Responsible for designing/implementing/maintaining networking and data communication systems.
Responsible for analyzing all technology needs. Overseeing the implementation of hardware/software/networking and other technology needs.
